scripts.test: npm run test:c8 && npm run test:istanbul
scripts.test:c8: npm run test:thread:c8 && npm run test:nothread:c8
scripts.test:thread:c8: npm run coverage:thread:c8 && npm run coverage-test:c8
scripts.test:nothread:c8: npm run coverage:c8 && npm run coverage-test:c8
scripts.test:istanbul: npm run test:thread:istanbul && npm run test:nothread:istanbul
scripts.test:thread:istanbul: npm run coverage:thread:istanbul && npm run coverage-test:istanbul
scripts.test:nothread:istanbul: npm run coverage:istanbul && npm run coverage-test:istanbul
